title: First of all, water
creator_credit: Ake Backlund, AB Nordisk Filmkopia and Radio Sweden
brief_description: The film aims to draw attention to the possibilities available for detecting and reaching subsoil water. Swedish scientists have made a great contribution as regards getting hold of, quickly and at reasonable cost, life-giving, pure water.
creator_credit_for_label: Ake Backlund, AB Nordisk Filmkopia and Radio Sweden
description: The film aims to draw attention to the possibilities available for detecting and reaching subsoil water. Swedish scientists have made a great contribution as regards getting hold of, quickly and at reasonable cost, life-giving, pure water.
